snippet: At the inaugural Stars and Stripes Day, Mr Speaker upset Adelaide in the Belmont Derby as the state took a step back into international racing.
abstract: Long shot Mr Speaker wins Belmont Derby horse race, and Minorette claims victory in Belmont Oaks.
lead_paragraph: At the inaugural Stars and Stripes Day, Mr Speaker upset Adelaide in the Belmont Derby as the state took a step back into international racing.

headline.main: New York Racing on Display at Belmont Park
headline.print_headline: Long Shot Claims a Top Belmont Event
